title: Recovering Old Account
body: In 2014/2015 I played league for a while and had a modest profile built up. I had to stop playing because of school but now I want to get back into it. However, the client updated and none of my login information updated and when I recovered my account nothing is there. None of the champions I had, runes, or skill points. and it made me choose a new summoner name even though if I look i can see my old summoner profile. Any Idea how I can recover this stuff or find my old login info?

replies.body: Something similar happened to me. I was played league 3 days ago, I ONLY HAVE ONE ACCOUNT. I get the new client today, I log in as I usually do, and it asked me to type in a summoner name, so I entered my summoner name (Yordle Jihadist) and it said the name was taken, so I just typed in a random name so I could play, and it REPLACED Yordle Jihadist with Vëë, Yordle Jihadist was lvl 30 with all champs and alot of skins, this summoner is lvl 1... I have tried everything and cannot find out how to get Yordle Jihadist back... I have never made another account and I have always logged into the NA region... this is really sad I can't do anything, I cant even play!
cant recover my account i was level thirty and my account was gone it started me over again when i logged in what to do my other name was Dzzzzzznuts please help me

Communicate with Riot’s[ Account Recovery Centre](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416)

The primary category is already selected. Fill in the rest of information (as much as possible).

http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/riotkayle_banner.jpg?itok=ikhDcpBV

Oh snap that's no good!!!! Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can give your account the attention it needs. I wouldn't want to miss anything while restoring it, but our account specialists can make sure to get everything restored that should be!

Communicate with Riot’s[ Account Recovery Centre](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416)

The primary category is already selected. Fill in the rest of information (as much as possible).

http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/riotkayle_banner.jpg?itok=ikhDcpBV
